msg.msgText: MessageSight log file "{0}" could not be purged because its transfer failed.

msgExplanation.p: Before purging the log file, an attempt was made to offload it to the destination specified by LogAutoTransfer configuration. The offload failed, so the log file could not be removed.

msgUserResponse.p:
Perform one of the following actions:
Ensure that LogAutoTransfer is configured properly and is enabled.
Specify Force=True option to remove log file even if the offload could not be completed.
